scripts.build: npm run -s clean && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.build:agent: sh -c 'npm run -s clean && tsc -b && vite build; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo BUILD_STATUS:ok; else echo BUILD_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.lint:agent: sh -c 'eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --ignore-pattern "src/**/*.d.ts" "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}"; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo LINT_STATUS:ok; else echo LINT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.lint:fix:agent: sh -c 'eslint --ignore-path .gitignore --ignore-pattern "src/**/*.d.ts" "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx}" --fix; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo LINT_STATUS:ok; else echo LINT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.format:agent: sh -c 'prettier --ignore-path .gitignore "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,css}" --check; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo FORMAT_STATUS:ok; else echo FORMAT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.format:fix:agent: sh -c 'prettier --ignore-path .gitignore "src/**/*.{ts,tsx,js,jsx,json,md,css}" --write; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo FORMAT_STATUS:ok; else echo FORMAT_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
scripts.typecheck:agent: sh -c 'tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.app.json && tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.node.json; code=$?; if [ $code -eq 0 ]; then echo TYPECHECK_STATUS:ok; else echo TYPECHECK_STATUS:fail:$code; fi; exit $code'
